item.title: Man accused of 8 fatal shootings in Phoenix area faces jury verdict following murder trial
item.description: A man tried for murder after he was accused of killing eight people in the metro Phoenix area in 2017 is set to hear a jury’s verdict against him

item.title: Campaign delays push to expand Medicaid in Florida until 2028, citing new state law
item.description: A campaign to expand Medicaid in Florida is delaying its push to get the issue on the ballot until 2028

item.title: Texas man facing execution for fatally beating 13-month-old girl during 'exorcism'
item.description: A Texas man is facing execution for killing his girlfriend’s 13-month-old daughter in what the couple had said was part of an “exorcism” to expel a de...

item.title: Alabama to execute man for 1997 shooting death of store clerk
item.description: Alabama is preparing to execute a man convicted of killing a woman during a 1997 gas station robbery

item.title: Police gather for funeral of 3 Pennsylvania detectives ambushed by gunman
item.description: Hundreds of police officers are expected to attend a closed funeral for three Pennsylvania detectives shot and killed last week by a man who had been ...
